text: well you can see now the huge crater
that was left after the blast it punched
right through into the ground are there
some twisted metal still there there are
investigators here at the scene now
trying to determine more about this very
powerful glass that took place in the
early morning and behind me you can see
the damage visible on the front of the
police headquarters a part of the facade
were peeled away there are air
conditioning units and bits of wires and
masonry hanging out and it's a testament
to the power of that explosion now this
should have been one of the most secure
locations in Cairo it was an obvious
target but attackers managed to reach
this spot and to send a message to the
very heart of the security establishment
as since we arrived riot police have
been in position trying to control the
crowds there was some angry chanting
against the Muslim Brotherhood just over
here you can see the historic facade of
the museum of islamic art that has also
been heavily damaged at the front by
this attack there's been a claim of
responsibility by a sinai-based militant
group Ansar Beit el martes they have
claimed previous attacks on the security
forces that all of this taking place on
the eve of the 3rd anniversary of the
revolution that swept away Hosny Mubarak
security forces are on alert and of
course there are fears about other
disturbances ahead
